resp = client.search(
    index="sales",
    size="0",
    aggs={
        "range": {
            "date_range": {
                "field": "date",
                "time_zone": "CET",
                "ranges": [
                    {
                        "to": "2016/02/01"
                    },
                    {
                        "from": "2016/02/01",
                        "to": "now/d"
                    },
                    {
                        "from": "now/d"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
